entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 10:19 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

Temperature: -35.5°C

Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
